jobs_results.title: Information Technology Analyst / Senior Analyst / Lead Analyst, Workday, Project Cumulus #sgunited #publicservice
jobs_results.via: via MNC Jobs Singapore | MNC Jobs In Singapore
jobs_results.description:
As part of Public Sector Transformation, PSD is working with various stakeholders to on-board close to 40 Statutory Boards by phases onto Workday, a Cloud Human Capital Management (HCM) / Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Saas Suite. The roll-out will bring about changes in business processes, systems and technology, job roles and organisation structures, and you will be at the forefront of these changes!
PSD engages a diverse group of stakeholders, including the Systems Integrator, the government in-house Shared Services VITAL, the HR Policy teams and other government agencies, to plan the subsequent activities to ensure the successful adoption of the new cloud-based system, transition of workforce, achievement of benefit realization, etc.
We believe in supporting you to develop professionally and personally. Beyond opportunities for on-the-job training and formal Workday Certification, there are attachment programmes to other stakeholders, be involved in other parts of the project... and gain a more holistic experience.
Responsibilities

For Statutory Boards in the Implementation Phase
• Translate policy intent and directions into applicable systems solutions for customers and stakeholders, and where necessary, propose new work processes to ensure the most effective and efficient method for implementation.
• Together with central government stakeholders, supporting the HR system architectural design for statutory boards while ensuring alignment with the business objectives.
• Configuration and testing of the systems, including the integrations of the core HR system with other third party or custom solutions.
• Ensure that data migration, data cleansing and data mapping work are well executed
• Develop best practice documents, workflows and manuals applicable to the statutory boards.
• Users training and engagement to ensure a successful deployment of the HR system.

For Statutory Boards in the Maintenance Phase
• Provide post-implementation support for the initial trouble-shooting and issue identification. If further technical support is necessary, to work with the System Integrator for possible solutioning, system re-configuration or adjustments.
• Support system enhancement evaluate new releases’ capabilities and assess the impact on current processes.
• Review of documents, workflows and manuals where necessary.

Other Project Matters
• Establish and maintain scalable processes that ensure best practices in HR.
• Identify opportunities for business process re-engineering (BPR) initiatives for productivity improvement, via transforming, streamlining and continuous improvement of work processes.

Requirements

[Values]
We are looking for self-motivated individuals who value integrity, teamwork and take pride in going the extra mile to provide excellent service.
[Work Experience & Competencies]
An ideal candidate should possess the following:
• [Thinking Clearly and Making Sound Judgement] Ability to examine complex problems and propose possible solutions, demonstrating good problem solving and root cause identification skills.
• [Working Effectively with Stakeholders] Strong communications and stakeholder management skills, adept at exploring issues from a user-centric perspective and contributing to a collaborative working environment.
• [Improving and Innovating Continuously] Possesses a mindset of continuous improvement, recommend and explore fresh ideas that may not have been tried and tested.
• [Project Management] Good project management skills to effectively manage project milestones, timeline and drive initiatives.
• [Application Software Development] Experience or knowledge in application software development, with interest to design and develop applications to meet users’ needs.
• [Information Technology] Some knowledge of IT governance processes and policies, with keen interest in leveraging technology to solve business problems on the ground.
• [Java Programming] Preferably possesses technical skills in Java Programming.
• [Experience in ERP implementation] Experience in the implementation of cloud SaaS or other ERP products, including Workday and Excelity payroll will be an added advantage.

Applicants with no prior experience are also welcome to apply.
[Personal Traits]
• Passion in technology with a desire for continuous improvement
• Agile and adaptable
• Able to proactively develop and manage relationships with key stakeholders
• Strong negotiation, conflict resolution, influencing, and stakeholder management skills
• Organised, meticulous and able to multi-task
• Good team player who is able to thrive in a fast-paced environment

Only shortlisted applicants will be notified within 2 weeks after closing date.

Successful candidates will be offered a 2-year contract.

minimumYearsExperience : 0

[CANDIDATES WHO REQUIRE WORK PASSES NEED NOT APPLY

jobs_results.title: Infrastructure Systems Analyst
jobs_results.description:
Chevron is accepting online applications for the position of Infrastructure Systems Analyst located in Jurong Island, Singapore through February 18, 2021 at 11:59 p.m. (Eastern Standard Time).

All interested applicants, please read the before submitting application.

This fast-paced, dynamic role specializes in Process Control Network (PCN) systems and Operational Technology (OT). The successful candidate will provide infrastructure support for the manufacturing plant located on Jurong Island.

Responsibilities for this position may include but are not limited to:

Accountable for maintaining the plants critical operational systems

Conducts design, configuration, integration, security, and lifecycle management of process control assets

Collaborates with site Process Control, Electrical and Instrumentation (E&I) teams and vendors to implement changes to PCN, PLC and SCADA systems

Provides technical support to local operations personnel in the ongoing maintenance and administration... of systems including cybersecurity, information and risk compliance, software license management, and software patch management

Supports new projects as well as maintenance of existing systems

Required Qualification

Bachelor's degree required in Computer Science, or equivalent experience

Experience managing Microsoft on-premises infrastructure, VMware and Cisco Network

5+ years of IT infrastructure hardware and software maintenance, configuration, testing, and procedure documentation experience

Microsoft Certified: Azure IoT Developer or Azure Fundamentals

Knowledge of Agile methodology, Cybersecurity, Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) and Robotic Process Automation (RPA) tools

Process Control System experience with in-depth knowledge of Honeywell process control environment preferred

Relocation Options:

Relocation will not be considered within Chevron parameters.

International Considerations:

Selected candidate will work in the Singapore under the local payroll system and benefits

jobs_results.title: System Analyst
jobs_results.description:
Do you have experience in software engineering?
Are you the person who build bridges between departments?
Do you like to be the architect of back-office software?
And still, want to build sometimes a prototype?

Be part of our dynamic and cooperative team as a System Analyst. You will work with experts and competent people in IT telecommunications and handle potential stakeholders globally.

Responsibilities
• Design an efficient and effective system that keeps a perfect balance between business requirements, technical requirements, performance, stability, and system maintainability,
• Participate in requirement analysis to add new features to the company’s products,
• Participate in change analysis to improve the company’s products,
• Write understandable, accurate, and quality technical specifications,
• Work with a software architect to understand the company’s products and its limitations,
• Cooperate with the Quality Assurance team to test the performance of the system,
•... Cooperate with the developer to make sure the specifications are defined and implemented correctly.

Requirements
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, or Information Technology,
• Fluent in verbal and written English and Indonesian language is a MUST,
• Minimal 3-years worth experience hands-on programming,
• Minimal 2-years worth experience working in system analysis and design. Certification will be a plus,
• Strong communication skills, including experience in writing technical documentation such as use cases, flow charts, swim lanes, sequence diagram, component diagram, etcetera,
• Capable of working autonomously and in teamwork,
• Keen with problem-solving and attention to detail
• Deep understanding and capable of applying design patterns, object-oriented analysis and design and architectural patterns,
• Good organisational skills,
• Project- and time-management skills,
• Attention to details.

We Offer
• A competitive remuneration package with social benefits,
• Additional family health insurance,
• Training and professional development,
• Career path in a rapidly growing company,
• Skilled co-workers to share experience with,
• A friendly and non-conflict working environment,
• Free parking space for motorcycle.

PT FIRST WAP INTERNATIONAL is a global leading company in digital, location & mobile advertising solutions with more than 17 years experience in the finance & banking, insurance manufacture, hotel, education and government segments.

jobs_results.title: Sr IT Analyst
jobs_results.description:
Sr. IT Analyst

Eager to take the next step in your career at a Top-notch MNC, we want to hear from you!

Our client is an established brand in the Information Technology who is now looking for a passionate and driven Senior IT Analyst.

This is an exciting opportunity to expand your skill set, achieve job satisfaction and work-life balance.

ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
• The Candidate shall be responsible to ensure all the applications systems remain in good working order.
• The Candidate is expected to support new application systems when they become operational.
• The Candidate shall be committed to meet the Service Level Agreement (SLA) timelines.
• The Candidate shall assist users and answer queries regarding the supported operational systems.
• The Candidate is expected to interact with the helpdesk agents, end-users and external vendors during application support and problem resolution.
• The Candidate is expected to be on standby support on weekends / public holidays. In the... event of scheduled downtime or during a crash, the Candidate is required to be in office during off- office-hours to support the systems.
• The Candidate shall be able to work independently with minimum supervision. He / She shall also work effectively as a team member among the system support and application development teams.

REQUIREMENTS
• The Candidate shall possess at least a bachelor’s degree in Information Technology (IT), Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent.
• Minimum of 5 years’ working experience in working experience in the IT industry, with exposure to end-to-end software development lifecycle (SDLC), system analysis and design, application development, and operational support and maintenance.
• Minimum of 1 year’ work experience in Singapore, and thus to have minimally equipped well in understanding and meeting the user requirements.
• The Candidate shall have be certified in Amazon Web Services like AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner or better. Please provide verifiable evidence, like YourAcclaim.com, or equivalent.
• The Candidate is preferred to be certified in Microsoft Azure platform. Please provide verifiable evidence, like YourAcclaim.com, or equivalent.
• The Candidate is preferred to have experience or certification in Google Cloud services. Please provide verifiable evidence, like YourAcclaim.com, or equivalent.
• The Candidate is preferred to have working experience with container technology like Docker, Docker Swarm or Kubernetes.
• The Candidate shall be proficient in C# (NET), or equivalent C-based programming language like PHP, PERL, C++, and C.
• The Candidate shall be proficient in front-end technologies, like HTML5, jQuery, JavaScript, and CSS.
• The Candidate is preferred to be experienced with front-end framework like Angular, AngularJS, REACT, or equivalent.
• The Candidate is preferred to have working experience with NodeJS.
• The Candidate shall be proficient in SQL technology like MSSQL, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MariaDB, or equivalent and be proficient in writing optimized SQL queries or stored procedures.
• The Candidate is preferred to have working experience with NoSQL like MongoDB, CouchDB, DynamoDB, or equivalent.

WHAT’S ON OFFER

You will be remunerated with an excellent base salary and entitled to attractive company benefits. Additionally, you will get the opportunity to enjoy a fun and collaborative work environment, alongside a strong career progression

To submit your application, please apply online or email your UPDATED CV in Microsoft Word format to Saridha@aven-sys.com and rajesh@aven-sys.com. Your interest will be treated with strict confidentiality.

CONSULTANT DETAILS

Consultant Name : Saridha Sekar

Reg No. : R1325954

Avensys Consulting Pte Ltd

EA Licence 12C5759

Privacy Statement: Data collected will be used for recruitment purposes only. Personal data provided will be used strictly in accordance with the relevant data protection law and Avensys' personal information and privacy policy

jobs_results.title: Middleware Engineer - Enterprise Monitoring System
jobs_results.description:
• Gather requirements from respective IT teams, discuss capabilities/configuration requirements and follow monitoring configuration lifecycle.
• Perform hands on configuration on monitoring tools in ITIM, APM, NPMD, and AIOps domains.
• Provide investigation on monitoring/alert inquires/issues and provide RCA.
• Troubleshoot system level issues and resolve recovery to minimize disruptions.
• LI-VW

Qualifications
• Highly analytical with strong understanding of the IT fundamentals and general knowledge on Enterprise IT
• Able to work on duty support shift for onsite support
• Positive attitude towards continuous learning
• Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
• Practical knowledge & hands-on experiences in implementing monitoring configurations, wireless, firewalls, VPNs and security gateways.
• Strong knowledge of the network, applications, communication protocols and technologies in enterprise environment.
• Working knowledge of CA UIM and/or APM and/or Spectrum and/or... NetQos and/or SOI monitoring tools
• Experience in scripting languages is a plus.
• Minimum 3 years of relevant working experience
• Certification on CA Monitoring tools UIM and/or APM and/or Spectrum and/or NetQos and/or SOI preferred

Primary Location: Singapore
Job: Technology Solutions
Organization: Group Operations & Technology Division
Schedule: Permanent
: Full-time
Job Posting: 07-Apr-2021, 7:53:28 AM

jobs_results.title: Senior / System Consultant (AIX & Linux)
jobs_results.description:
Responsibilities
• Install, configure and maintain server operating systems and repair server (AIX, Linux,VMWare)
• Deploy, configure, manage and troubleshoot the following:
• AIX and Redhat Linux severs
• Esxi and Virtual Servers

Shortlisted candidates will be offered a 1 Year Direct Contract employment

jobs_results.title: Project Manager / Business Analyst
jobs_results.description:
The Project Manager is in charge of project success.

His/her responsibilities are:

To handle a highly functional project. The project manager is required to perform a dual role as a Project Manager cum Business Analyst in order to be effective. He/she needs to understand the concepts of structured products/derivatives and delta 1 products.

In addition, his/her responsibilities are:

Facilitate committees and work closely with the project team to deliver the project deliverables, prioritization, estimations and planning Creates partnership with product owners, stakeholders and transversal teams (security, solution architects, compliance…) and the Third Party Vendor that delivers solution to the system Ensure the team’s adherence to delivery schedule and estimates Contributes & ensures compliance to the governance, Secure SDLC frameworks Provide regular update and reporting to his/her Division Managers (Domain Heads if required) Understand the impediments/blockers faced by the team... and help the team to remove as much as possible Manage the release planning and management of the deliveries and update necessary tools required Able to multi-task and work on multiple projects if required

As a Business Analyst as secondary role, his/her responsibilities are:

To handle other Regulatory topics if required like: AEOI/CRS, FATCA, SRD II, IRS871m Gather the requirements from the Product Owner and end users Writes GFS (or user stories) and confirm the understanding with the developers. Perform system analysis with the BA of other applications squads/teams when involved in multi-systems features and interfaces. Work with developers on system development and unit testing. Work with the testing team to conduct system integration testing to ensure quality of delivery. Support UAT (reproduce issues, monitoring, fixing with the team)

About you

Skills & Experience

Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent experience required Experience in working with large distributed IT teams At least 5+ years of experience/exposure application development with Java technologies / Reporting systems

Mandatory

Exposure to applications handling Fiscal or Regulatory Reporting Banking knowledge related to Wealth Management Highly analytical, able to investigate, troubleshoot and determine issues at root cause Excellent communication skills, able to engage with end users and stakeholders Good understanding of project lifecycle and experience in functional/technical specification Great listener, empathetic and with a ‘can-do’ attitude and interpersonal skills Excellent written and oral communication skills

Plus

JIRA usage, Confluence, Release Management Tools Previous experience with Scrum or Agile methodology, SDLC, Waterfall Exposure to applications revolving around: AAA, Olympic, Client Management Systems, Datawarehouse, Batch processing of reports Scrum Master Certification or PMP (or equivalent

jobs_results.title: Application Systems Analyst
jobs_results.description:
Panbil Residence 1st and 2nd floor, Jl. Ahmad Yani, Muka Kuning, Nongsa, Batam, Riau Islands, Indonesia

Full-time

Level: Employee - Standard

Company Description

Inmarsat has been at the forefront of global mobile satellite communications for over forty years, and is the market leading provider of voice and high-speed data communications for users on land, at sea and in the air through its constellation of 14 geostationary satellites. Inmarsat is a privately owned company with a profitable track record and significant growth aspirations. This is represented by more than 55 nationalities in the workforce, reflecting the global and dynamic nature of the business. With an investment of over $3 billion in its latest network infrastructure, Inmarsat is at the forefront of global mobile communications innovation.

Chief Operations Office

Inmarsat’s Chief Operations Office (COO) plays a vital role managing the services that keep our business running and delivering to our customers. COO... consists of 10 functions including: Satellite Operations, Network Operations, Service Assurance, Service Delivery Aviation and Customer Assurance, Service Delivery and Supply Chain, Project Management Office, Global Cyber Security, Group IT and Real Estate & Facilities.

Job Description

Primary role purpose:

Application Support Analyst will be responsible to provide technical support for existing applications and supporting the customers in the current suite of Inmarsat solutions and other new services that are introduced. Performing daily operations for OAMS (Off Air Monitoring Systems), GCP (Google Cloud Platform) systems and other systems as required. Working as part of an established team providing friendly, efficient, professional and first class IT support across the globe.

The job role provide support from 8 am to 5 pm, Monday to Friday. However, due to time differences between Batam, UK and Canada, the team may need to work adjusted hours to ensure that adequate communication can happen for continuity and handover. It may also be required to provide out of hours support for the operations or when system test and upgrades are applied, or when new services are launched.

Key Responsibilities
• Develop an understanding of Inmarsat’s system requirements and operations.
• Engage internal/external customer around the globe to make sure their problem is solved and their issue on Inmarsat’s products and services are supported.
• Do investigation to find Root-Cause of any malfunctions and troubleshoot the issue.
• Escalate critical issue by providing detailed analysis, recommend a substantial solution and coordinate with all parties involved.
• Proactively monitor services to ensure they are maintained, enhanced and operate effectively.
• Performing daily operations for OAMS, GCP and others system; monitoring, investigation, troubleshooting and escalation for any issues based on the SOP and escalation procedure.

Qualifications

Essential Knowledge and Skills:
• Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or Technology Diploma from a recognized institution or equivalent.
• An understanding of RDBMS and SQL.
• An understanding of Linux & Windows operating environments.
• Broad technical background and experience with technologies such as: .NET, Java, Web Services, Python, JavaScript, Node.js.
• Up-to-date knowledge of scripting and application software
• Analytical approach and problem solving skills
• Self-organized and able to work unsupervised.
• Good spoken and written level of English
• Good team working skills.

Desirable knowledge, skills and experience:
• ITIL certified
• Knowledge on MongoDB
• Knowledge of API Gateway tools such as Layer 7 or Apigee
• Knowledge on RPA (Robotic Process Automation) is an advantage
• Experience in mobile/telecommunications industry

Additional Information

You must be eligible to work in this location advertised.

Inmarsat Values:

Our values define Inmarsat’s culture and represent what we believe in. Inmarsat employees aspire to certain behaviours which support our corporate values, they create a stronger working environment and lie at the heart of our continued success as an organisation.
• Accountability – taking ownership, getting results and keeping our promises
• Respect – collaborating, embracing diversity and valuing differences
• Excellence – creating bold solutions for our customers and putting quality at the heart of everything we do
